GSD.description:
selinux: allow FIOCLEX and FIONCLEX with policy capability

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit 448857f58009fd950f4d732e8f1e4fcf859cb4b1. For more details please see the references link.
